response.headline: Seoul's largest shopping mall features indoor waterfall, botanical garden, and massive food court for solo exploration
response.summary: The Hyundai Seoul mall in Seongsu-dong offers solo travelers an indoor waterfall, botanical garden, and one of Seoul's biggest food courts. Lou Ahn recommends 10 places and experiences in Seoul for solo exploration, from hanok to waterfall cafes and self-care stops.

extracted_text: Wander through Seoul's largest shopping mall
With an indoor waterfall, a botanical garden and one of Seoul's biggest food courts, it's the perfect spot to wander solo and treat yourself

Solo in Seoul? Here are 10 places and experiences that prove exploring the city on your own can be just as magical. From hanok to waterfall cafes, day trips, and self-care stops, Seoul is made... more
Search 路 Things To Do In Seoul Korea
image_details.key_interest: The Hyundai Seoul shopping mall as a solo travel destination
visual_hierarchy: Wander through Seoul's largest shopping mall
Multi-level mall interior with circular planters
